title: Diablo 4 Seasons, Cosmetics, and Battle Pass Breakdown Presentation
description:
Learn more about the upcoming season coming to Diablo 4 and what to expect from it. Including more on a Season Questlines, new gameplay, customization and more. The season will be dropping around mid to late July as announced by the development team during this presentation.

Timestamps
0:00 Intro
1:37 Seasonal Questlines
4:26 New Gameplay (Power and more)
5:49 Long Term Progression
8:24 Battle Pass Breakdown
19:55 Quality of Life Updates and Changes
22:37 Customizations
29:20 Aspirational Challenges

#diablo4 #d4 #gaming

title: Mortal Kombat - "It Is Almost Time" Teaser Trailer
Making Ghost Recon: Breakpoint as IMMERSIVE as Possible | No HUD
description:
At launch Ghost Recon: Breakpoint was busted and kinda boring. But what if I told you that, in the five years since release, it has become one of the best Ghost Recon games of all time and an excellent open-world game?
#gaming #ghostrecon #gamespot

Welcome to No Hud, a show where we tinker with games to find the new, best, and most interesting ways to play them. In this episode, we'll show you how to turn Breakpoint into a smart and strategic open-world shooter that earns the Tom Clancy title. It's a tough mission, so we've recruited Ghost Recon expert Deef to our squad.
